questions.question: One joule of work is said to be done when__:

options.A: a force of 1 dyne causes a displacement of 1 cm.
options.B: a force of 1 dyne causes a displacement of 1 m.
options.C: a force of 1 N causes a displacement of 1 cm.
options.D: a force of 1 N causes a displacement of 1 m.

questions.question: On heating a pure silicon circular disc with a circular hole at the centre, the diameter of the hole:
By how many times are the Electrostatic forces stronger than the Gravitational Forces for a fixed distance?
